io.micronaut.core.io.scan

Interface ClassPathResourceLoader

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ResourceLoader
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultClassPathResourceLoader

    public interface ClassPathResourceLoader
extends ResourceLoader
    Abstraction to load resources from the the classpath.

    1.0
    Author:
    James Kleeh, Graeme Rocher
